name: Crazy Brick Hit - Fire Block
description:
Crazy brick hit is a classic free game about hit bricks.Swipe to control direction and launch the balls to break all the bricks. Relax your brain and challenge the best high score. Come and play the game for fun!

Break the most balls as you can to get the highest score.
We also prepared a variety of levels for you to challenge.
And there are Endless mode for you to challenge.
You can experience bricks in different shapes,Such as rectangles, squares, circle etc.
Give you more excitement and pleasure.Come and try it on!

Game Features:
Free
No network
Simple control
100 levels
Endless mode
